content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals x cubed plus 2 x squared minus 8 x"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi></math>. Which of the following is equivalent to <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> and displays values that are solutions to <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 0"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses x minus open parentheses 0 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses 2 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>0</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>4</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses x minus open parentheses 0 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses 2 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses negative 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>0</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses x minus open parentheses 0 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses negative 2 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>0</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>4</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses x minus open parentheses 0 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses negative 2 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses negative 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>0</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses x minus open parentheses 0 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses 2 close parentheses close parentheses open parentheses x minus open parentheses negative 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>0</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

topic.text: 1.11: Equivalent Representations of Polynomial and Rational Expressions

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
